channel.title: [508] Help please [508]
channel.description: Well, i was wondering on a 508 how do you change where you spawn so the home, I want to change it because at the moment its not near any npc's that i have placed and is very annoying, help please!

item.description:

thank you![br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 22, 2009, 05:50:16 am[/size][hr]May i ask aswell , How do you get rid of / edit the cross the wilderness ditch notice?

item.title: [508] Help please [508]
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

In Player.java, search for ‘craft’, and below it will be the coordinates at which you spawn at.

Read full topic
